mapper.update:
update user

accout = #{accout,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},

creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del = #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accout = #{accout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del = #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
